article_title: Tesla to Announce Grid-Scale Battery Pack, Home Battery April 30
article_text:
Tesla Motors Inc. told investors and analysts in a note Tuesday it would announce a grid-scale battery pack as well as a home battery in its announcement scheduled for April 30.

Tesla’s Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk had previously announced through Twitter the company would announce a new product line—not a vehicle—on April 30. There is an event planned at Tesla’s Hawthorne, Calif.-based design studio to unveil the product. Mr. Musk had previously said the company was working on a stationary battery storage product. In...

article_metadata.author: Mike Ramsey
article_metadata.article.origheadline: Tesla to Announce Grid-Scale Battery Pack, Home Battery April 30

article_summary:
Tesla Motors Inc. told investors and analysts in a note Tuesday it would announce a grid-scale battery pack as well as a home battery in its announcement scheduled for April 30.
Tesla’s Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk had previously announced through Twitter the company would announce a new product line—not a vehicle—on April 30.
Mr. Musk had previously said the company was working on a stationary battery storage product.
There is an event planned at Tesla’s Hawthorne, Calif.-based design studio to unveil the product.
